item.title: Breaking the Silos: Inclusion
item.description: At this meetup, we focus on inclusion in tech companies. Discover new strategies to foster diversity, equity and belonging in your organisation, hear from industry experts, and connect with like-minded individuals from the community.

item.title: Breaking the Silos: Neurodiversity
item.description: Our first meetup focuses on Neurodiversity (ADHD, ASD, intellectual giftedness, etc.), featuring four live keynote speakers.

item.title: About the Initiative
item.description: Breaking the Silos is all about breaking siloed thinking and approaches within Belgian tech companies, and improving collaboration by: enlightening companies to choose sustainable solutions for problems over short-term fixes inspiring companies to embrace change in their market and in society as a whole building a safe and inclusive work environment for all people involved showcasing the advantages and success stories of breaking siloed thinking. We build a community of like-minded organisations, leaders and people that want to make sustainable change happen.

item.title: Our Community
item.description: Meetup.com To become a member and RSVP to our events, join the Breaking the Silos group on Meetup.com. Discord server Members of the community can engage with each other on our Discord server. Discord is a messaging platform similar to Microsoft Teams and Slack. We also use it to share book suggestions, related insights and articles, and more. You can join the Breaking the Silos Discord server here. Social media You can also find and engage with us on LinkedIn, Mastodon, Instagram, and YouTube.
